yavamajjhaka： yavamajjhaka（ti）
ယဝမဇ္ဈက（တိ）
[yava+majjha+ka．sakkaṭapiṭakanitea yavakacchaka-hu rhieiea．]
[ယဝ+မဇ္ဈ+က။ သက္ကဋပိဋက၌ ယဝကစ္ဆက-ဟု ရှိ၏။]
Yavamajjhaka：A village near Mithilā，the residence of Amarādevī，  wife of Mahosadha．J．vi．365，366； 330 says there were villages of this name on   the four sides of Mithilā．

yavamajjhaka：ယဝမဇ္ဈက（တိ）
[ယဝ+မဇ္ဈ+က။ သက္ကဋပိဋက၌ ယဝကစ္ဆက-ဟု ရှိ၏။]
（၁） ယဝမဇ္ဈကရွာ။ （၂） ယဝမဇ္ဈကရွာ၌တည်သောအိမ်။ မူရင်းကြည့်ပါ။
